afribat 0.1.0
  • Reference

Bat records as simple features. Occurrence records of 266 bat species from 53 genera and 12 families (order Chiroptera, class Mammalia) from sub-Saharan Africa.

Source: R/afribats_sf.R
afribats_sf.Rd

Bat records as simple features. Occurrence records of 266 bat species from 53 genera and 12 families (order Chiroptera, class Mammalia) from sub-Saharan Africa.

afribats_sf

Format

A tibble with 17255 rows and 12 variables:

family

a character denoting family of bat record

genus

a character denoting genus of bat record

species

a character denoting species of bat record

museum

a character denoting museum accession number of bat record

date

a date denoting date on which the bat was collected or otherwise recorded

year

an integer denoting body mass (grams)

country

a character denoting country in which the bat was recorded

location

a character denoting name of the location or locality that the bat was recorded

reference

a character denoting source of the record, mostly papers

holotype

a character denoting whether the record is a type specimen

checked

a character denoting whether the bat specimen was examined by the authors

geometry

the geometry list column, crs is EPSG:4326

Source

Originally published in: Monadjem, A., Montauban, C., Webala, P.W. et al. African bat database: curated data of occurrences, distributions and conservation metrics for sub-Saharan bats. Sci Data 11, 1309 (2024). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-024-04170-71
